attributes.action: Re-open the wondeful shop, Dirty Marys in Parkes Hall Road, Dudley.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm bringing this to everyones attention as I feel that the children in the area have nowhere to obtain to wonderful sweeties and stuff (Marathon bars in particular). We hereby sign this petition to return Dirty Marys to it's former glory. Amen.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
